languages.text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.
languages.original_text: По повериям адептов Культа Механикус, это дух, обитающий во всех технологиях.

traits.locale_text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.
A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.
A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.

languages.text: По повериям адептов Культа Механикус, это дух, обитающий во всех технологиях.
Ein Geist, von dem die Anhänger des Kult Mechanicus glauben, dass er jede existierende Technologie bewohnt und kontrolliert.
languages.original_text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.

traits.locale_text: Ein Geist, von dem die Anhänger des Kult Mechanicus glauben, dass er jede existierende Technologie bewohnt und kontrolliert.

languages.text: Esprit qui, selon les adeptes du Culte Mechanicus, habite et contrôle toute technologie existante.
languages.original_text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.

traits.locale_text: Esprit qui, selon les adeptes du Culte Mechanicus, habite et contrôle toute technologie existante.

languages.text: 机械修会的信徒所相信的灵魂。机魂栖息在一切科技造物之中，负责控制机械造物的运作。
languages.original_text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的信徒所相信的灵魂。机魂栖息在一切科技造物之中，负责控制机械造物的运作。

languages.text: 機械教団の信奉者たちが、現存するあらゆるテクノロジーに宿り、それをコントロールすると信じている精霊。
languages.original_text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.

traits.locale_text: 機械教団の信奉者たちが、現存するあらゆるテクノロジーに宿り、それをコントロールすると信じている精霊。

languages.text: Espíritu que, según los creyentes del Culto Mechanicus, mora y controla toda la tecnología que existe.
languages.original_text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.

traits.locale_text: Espíritu que, según los creyentes del Culto Mechanicus, mora y controla toda la tecnología que existe.

languages.text: Cult Mechanicus taraftarlarınca, var olan tüm teknolojilerin içinde yaşadığına ve bu cihazları kontrol ettiğine inanılan bir ruh.
languages.original_text: A spirit believed by the adherents of the Cult Mechanicus to inhabit and control any technology in existence.
